alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Olmsted (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 7:13PM CDT until July 22 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN OLMSTED AND NORTHEASTERN DODGE COUNTIES... At 713 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mantorville, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Rochester around 735 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include County Roads 20 And 5, Oslo, Danesville, Eden, County Roads 3 And 108, Highway 57 And 570th Street and County Roads 6 And 15. This includes Interstate 90 in Minnesota between mile markers 205 and 207. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
